title: (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Delegation of Ministerial
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Delegation of Ministerial 

Functions) (No. 3) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited health (delegation ministerial functions) (no 3) order 2025

title: (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 
the Minister for Health conferred on her by or under sections 32 and 35 of the 
Nursing Homes Support Scheme Act 2009 (No. 15 of 2009) are delegated to 
Kieran O’Donnell, Minister of State at the Department of Health. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

4 March, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 7th March, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [67] 3

title: (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977), hereby order as follows:
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The Health (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 3) Order 2025 delegates 
to Kieran O’Donnell, Minister of State at the Department of Health the statutory 
powers and duties of the Minister for Health mentioned in the Order. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [67]
